lead: Recent developments in climate technology and AI highlight innovative approaches to weather forecasting and the potential of artificial intelligence in addressing climate challenges.

stories.title: Rainbow Weather raises $5.5M to refine real-time weather forecasting
stories.summary: Rainbow Weather, a Warsaw-based startup, has secured $5.5 million in seed funding to enhance hyperlocal, real-time weather forecasting. The company aims to provide minute-by-minute precipitation forecasts, focusing on short-term accuracy that is currently lacking in the industry. This innovative approach could significantly benefit individuals and businesses by delivering precise weather updates tailored to their immediate needs.

stories.summary: Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, believes that advancements in AI could play a pivotal role in solving major global issues, including climate change. His ambitious plans involve a staggering $1 trillion investment in data centers that could consume vast amounts of energy, raising concerns about sustainability. As OpenAI expands its influence across various sectors, the balance between technological advancement and environmental responsibility becomes increasingly critical.
